pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Hestia Extend Bibliography## Install```bashpip install hestia_earth.extend_bibliography```### Usage```pythonfrom hestia_earth.extend_bibliography import extend# nodes is a Dict {nodes: []}result = extend( nodes, # pass in the desired crendentials for each API mendeley_username=MENDELEY_USERNAME, mendeley_password=MENDELEY_PASSWORD, # enable Mendeley SDK mendeley_api_url=MENDELEY_API_URL, # enable Mendeley through API URL (default to using the SDK if not provided) wos_api_key=WOS_API_KEY, # enable WoS REST API wos_api_user=WOS_API_USER, wos_api_pwd=WOS_API_PASSWORD, # enable WoS SOAP API enable_unpaywall=False, # enable Unpaywall as fallback enable_crossref=False, # enable CrossRef as last fallback (slower))```
